description: a(n) is the starting position of the first occurrence of a string of exactly n 1's in the decimal expansion of Pi.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Pi Digits.
author: Leonardo Bitran (lbitran(AT)reuna.cl)
extensions: More terms from Colin Martin (cbmartin(AT)tpg.com.au), Mar 03 2002
Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_ at the suggestion of _Andrew Plewe_, May 27 2007
